content.question: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how McClure uses literary elements and techniques to establish a setting that helps convey Zita’s complex perspective.

frqParts.text: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how McClure uses literary elements and techniques to establish a setting that helps convey Zita’s complex perspective.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
